verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We are all together to call upon Your Name
There is nothing we like better
Than to sing and give You praise

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord we welcome You, we welcome You
We welcome You, come fill this place

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Bringing healing and salvation
Let Your kingdom come;
Right here just like in heaven,
May Your will be done

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Father come fill this place, we welcome You!
Jesus we seek Your face, because
All we want to do, is give our love to You!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
We welcome You, we welcome You
We welcome You, come fill this place!
